Peyona<tm tmtype="reg"/> National funding/access decisions

Scottish Medicines Consortium (SMC) Decisions

The Scottish Medicines Consortium has advised (September 2013) that Peyona is accepted for use within NHS Scotland for the treatment of primary apnoea of premature newborns only whilst Peyona is available at the price agreed in the patient access scheme.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
